author: coliver
msg: Added 'onAddRow' and 'onRemoveRow' callbacks to Repeater and modified property handling to allow JS properties to supercede Widget id's. If there is a conflict between a widget id and a property then you can use getWidget(id) as an escape mechanism to access the widget

author: joerg
msg: show a "real" error page on invalid continuation

author: joerg
msg: don't hide the stacktrace by default as the JS might not be available, hiding it onload

author: cziegeler
msg: Fix proper releasing (part of bug 27013 submitted by Marco Rolappe)
